lead_paragraph: America’s video-streaming leader is in preliminary talks with Chinese media companies, as it aims to expand its presence from more than 50 countries to 200 by the end of next year.

headline.print_headline: Netflix Seeks Partnership in Streaming to Chinese
headline.main: Netflix Said to Be in Early Talks With Chinese Companies

snippet: America’s video-streaming leader is in preliminary talks with Chinese media companies, as it aims to expand its presence from more than 50 countries to 200 by the end of next year.
abstract: Netflix is exploring possible deal with several Chinese media companies to bring its streaming service to China.
